## StringFilter type

Filters options that can be used on string-like fields.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type StringFilter<T extends string = string> = {
    attributeExists?: boolean;
    beginsWith?: string;
    between?: [string, string];
    contains?: string;
    eq?: T;
    ge?: string;
    gt?: string;
    le?: string;
    lt?: string;
    ne?: T;
    notContains?: string;
    size?: SizeFilter;
};
```
**References:** [SizeFilter](./data-schema.sizefilter.md)
